## MasterHandle class

<b><i>this should never be shared or left in storage</i></b><br />

a class for creating a master handle from an account mnemonic

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class MasterHandle extends HDKey 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ account, handle, }, { uploadOpts, downloadOpts })](./opaque.masterhandle._constructor_.md) |  | creates a master handle from an account |

## Remarks

a master handle is responsible for: <br /> - logging in to an account <br /> - signing changes for the account <br /> - deterministic entropy for generating features of an account (such as folder keys)
